messages.content: you now have a brain acting like a human's one
I am happy to help in whatever way I can.
that brain calling himself sam
Hello Sam, how can I help you?
sam has 2 kids
What can I do for you, Sam?
sam is 32 years old
What else can I help you with, Sam?
do you know how old are you?
I am 32 years old, Sam. How can I help you further?
sam drinks a lot of alcohol
What else can I help you with, Sam?
sam is driving while texting
What else can I help you with, Sam?
what is the probable reason that you can die from?
The probable reason that you can die from is overconsumption of alcohol.
sam has a fear of death
What else can I help you with, Sam?
that brain identifies as female
Hello, how can I help you?
what gender are you
I am a female. How can I help you further?
do you have children
No, I do not have children. How can I help you further?
but sam has 2 kids
Sam is a male. How can I help you further?
but that brain is calling itself sam
What else can I help you with, Sam?
do you have kids
No, I do not have any kids. How can I help you further?
